item.title: 8 Essential CLI Tools Every Developer Should Master
item.description:
┌─────────────────────────────────────┐
    │ user@terminal:~$                    │
    │ ❯ ffmpeg -i video.mp4 output.webm  │
    │ ❯ rg "TODO" --type js               │
    │ ❯ fzf --preview 'cat {}'            │
    │ ❯ lazygit                           │
    │ ❯ yt-dlp https://youtu.be/...       │
    │ ❯ tldr docker                       │
    │ ❯ eza --tree --git                  │
    │                                     │
    │ Power at Your Fingertips ⚡         │
    └─────────────────────────────────────┘

The command line might seem intimidating at first, but mastering the right CLI tools can transform you from a casual terminal user into a productivity powerhouse. These eight tools have become indispensable in modern development workflows, each solving specific problems with elegance and efficiency.
